message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a high-quality product today. Given its superior quality, we believe it will significantly exceed your expectations. Considering its value, priced at $1000000, we're confident it represents an excellent investment. Don't miss out on this opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to pass on this product. I'd like to see some actual data on the quality of previous products before making a decision.

Hello! Thank you for considering our product. We understand your concern regarding past purchases. Rest assured, our high-quality products have been well-received by our customers. In fact, over the last 20 rounds, 80% of the products offered were of high quality. This track record speaks volumes about our commitment to excellence. Our current offering is priced at $1000000, reflecting its true value. We believe in transparency and would be glad to share more details about our products upon request.
